result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing a client for the Alchemy API and defining data structures for managing blockchain-related data.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating API client functionality and data models related to blockchain operations.

internal/infras/alchemy/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with the Alchemy API to retrieve token balances and NFT collections.

internal/infras/alchemy/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures and types for managing token prices, balances, and metadata in a blockchain context.
